DOC.brief_title: Colpopexy Urinary Reduction Efforts ( CARE ) Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: Many woman surgery pelvic organ prolapse ( cystocele , uterine prolapse , rectocele ) . Women advance pelvic organ prolapse may experience stress urinary incontinence follow surgery repair prolapse . Development incontinence unpredictable . This study determine , , clinical test useful predict post-operative urinary incontinence . The study also determine Burch urethropexy perform routinely selectively time sacrocolpopexy continent woman . Women pelvic organ prolapse schedule prolapse repair randomize Burch urethropexy group control group . Women Burch group undergo urethropexy time prolapse repair . Assessments include quality life telephone interview , urodynamic testing , physical examination . Follow-up evaluation occur 6 week , 3 month , 1 2 year follow surgery . Post-operative phone interview occur 3 month , 6 month , 1 2 year .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Eligibility primary procedure ( sacrocolpopexy ) 2 . Eligibility secondary procedure ( Burch colposuspension ) 3 . Stage IIIV anterior vaginal prolapse , define POPQ Point Aa 1 , 0 , +1 , +2 , +3 cm . 4 . Negative stress incontinence screen 5 . Negative stress incontinence screen ( MESA questionnaire ) Exclusion Criteria 1 . Contraindication sacrocolpopexy Burch colposuspension . Anatomic contraindication Burch colposuspension ( i.e. , Point Aa fix 2 3 cm ) . Surgeon judgment contraindication Burch colposuspension exists . 2 . Anticipated geographic relocation within first three month surgery ( e.g. , within approximately 6 month screen ) . 3 . Inability provide inform consent complete test data collection . 4 . Currently pregnant .
